4. PoL + Concentrated Liquidity = Next-Gen AMM
By combining:
•Uniswap V3-style precision
•Sunrise’s PoL design
•vRISE incentives
Sunrise unlocks high efficiency liquidity mining where LPs are rewarded for being accurate, not just big.

So in essence;
